title: 2 BR, 2nd Floor Apt. - $2,200
posting_body: Offered is a well maintained, very spacious 2 bedroom apartment with screened-in back porch and parking.
Recently painted, new flooring in Bath and Kitchen.
Hardwood floors throughout rest of apt.
Decorative fireplace and built-in china closet.
7 minute walk to the train and close to highway.
Walk to downtown for shopping and great dining.
There's a lot to do in this great city!
Heat and hot water are all by natural gas.
Tenant responsible for utility bills (gas and electric).
Unit is non-smoking and pets are not allowed.
Upon signing lease, 1st and second months' rent and security deposit of $1,200 would be required.
Please email me to set up an appointment to view.
